Description:
OPPOSITE FORESHORE - SECLUDED LOCATION !
Located in a quiet street close to township is this good size family home featuring -
- Formal living area
- Open plan kitchen with electric cooking/meals area
- Family room
- Split-system air conditioner
- Sliding door to back decking
- 3 bedrooms all with BIRs - master with walk-in-robe
- Family bathroom with separate shower and full bath
- Ensuite
- Floating floor throughout except bedrooms which have WWC
- Rural outlook
- Tenanted with tenant on month to month paying $260 per week
- This property is close to local shops which offers cafes, bank, chemist, doctor, newsagency , ambulance depot, v-line and school bus stops. Pathway to beach nearly opposite.
Phillip Island and major shopping centre approx.. 25 mins.
We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable. However, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations. www.1stre.com.au
Property Code: 401987188
Insights: 18 Frederick Drive, Grantville VIC 3984 was last sold in 2017 and 22 other 3 bedroom house in Grantville have recently been sold.

Description:
SECLUDED AND COUNTRY FEEL BY THE BEACH
This delightful home is situated only a few minutes drive to the beach, shops and services at Grantville and only 15 minutes to Phillip Island yet it feels like you are right in the bush in a very private settings where you can watch the kangaroos and enchiladas play. Set on a manageable 604m2 block with the feeling that you are on acres. The home is modern inside and has three good sized bedrooms, two living areas, one at the front of the home with would make an ideal home office and the other at the back with lovely views over the reserve at the back and a deck to relax on. There is an open plan kitchen and central bathroom. Outside is a large double garage plus workshop, three tanks for the house and two smaller ones for the gardens. A perfect place to live and relax.
Insights: 69 JUNE STREET, Grantville VIC 3984 was last sold in 2017 and 22 other 3 bedroom house in Grantville have recently been sold.

Description:
UNIQUE OPPORTUNITY BY THE BEACH
QUIRKY, UNIQUE, BALI LIKE OASIS WITH POTENTIAL PLUS!!! This property is perfect for holidays or a permanent home or for the extended family with teenagers or elderly parents with three separate dwellings. Set opposite the foreshore and sandy beach at Grantville, only fifteen minutes to Phillip Island, thirty minutes to Cranbourne. As you wander through the property you will be impressed with the ambiance, the pockets to relax in and the flow of the property. The main home at the top of the property has two bedrooms, open plan living and kitchen, bathroom with large shower, split system air conditioner and an entertaining area. The studio below has one bedroom, a large open plan living area and BBQ room, separate bathroom and an entertaining area. The second separate studio has one bedroom, large open plan living area and a separate bathroom and entertaining area. There is a double garage and lots of extra space for parking cars, caravans, boats etc. A true pleasure to inspect and dream of owning this beauty.
Insights: 25 MALCOLM DRIVE, Grantville VIC 3984 was last sold in 2017 and 4 other 4 bedroom house in Grantville have recently been sold.

Description:
LIFESTYLE OPPORTUNITY
This property is situated in an outstanding position in a quiet rural setting under 2 kms to Bass Hwy and access to Melbourne, 1 hour.
This superb grazing property is flat to gently undulating. Currently running a variety of stock; cattle, sheep, pigs, geese & more, this excellent property lends itself to a wide range of agricultural interests. Water is via a bore and a dam with a reliable, secure annual rainfall.
A large lock up shed approx. 11x6m includes a kitchen and bunk beds for some comfort and overnight stay. Another 11x6m steel shed is for hay and equipment plus further shedding for storage. Cattle yards adjoin an enclosed area ideal for pigs, chooks, geese etc. The property is fenced into 5 paddocks. Along with trees at the front (shed area) and some scattered gums, there is approx. 3 acres of bush at the rear of the property.
The township of Grantville on Westernport bay is only 5 minutes and the boat ramp at Corinella is only 10 minutes, Kilcunda & San Remo beaches are only 20 minutes. An outstanding opportunity to enjoy country living within a commutable distance from Melbournes Eastern Suburbs.
If you would like to inspect this property or have any questions, please contact Don Olden on 0417 805 312 or Jean OLoughlin 0428 571 083.

Description:
EASTERN SHORES ESTATE LOT 10, 1414m2
Eastern Shores newest land release Stage 3 has sold out fast and this fabulous large site of 1414 m2 offers Westernport Bay views and French Island. With a bushland reserve alongside this part of the estate, you have woodland views as well as Bay views. A generous building envelope is 18.2 m in width lending itself to most house plans.
Eastern Shores is a comfortable 80 minute drive from Melbourne metropolitan and only 40 minutes commute to Pakenham and a short 15 min drive to Phillip Island and all that it has to offer.
With a variety of block sizes available to suit a wide range of needs come design and build your stunning dream home on one of these affordable coastal blocks where life and style come together.

Description:
FIXED PRICE BRAND NEW SIMONDS HOME - CONSTRUCTION UNDERWAY
Building is underway by Simonds Homes on Lot 13 Buttonwood Way in the 'Eastern Shores Estate' in central Grantville and will be completed in approx. 14 weeks. This is a fixed price 3 bedroom house and land package. Featuring a double garage with sectional overhead remote controlled door and internal access to the house, the house features easy care Colorbond products including the roof, gutters and water tank.
A beautifully proportioned master suite at the front of the home hosts a walk in robe, a relaxing ensuite bathroom and a split system air conditioner. Two other bedrooms are located close to the family area of the home and all have built in robes and are serviced by a family bathroom. The modern kitchen hosts a 900 mm chef's upright stainless steel gas range. A second split system warms or cools the open plan living area where there is a sliding door to the outdoors from the family area, making entertaining easy.
Colorbond fencing to 3 boundaries and a concrete driveway plus path to the front door. Make this yours with 5-10% deposit with no progress payments. Check out the photos for the floor plan.
Located at the gateway to the beautiful Bass Coast, Eastern Shores in Grantville is a comfortable 75 minute drive (approx) from Melbourne metropolitan and only 40 minutes commute to Pakenham and a short 20 min drive to Phillip Island and all that it has to offer. No progress payments, balance payment on completion.
Insights: 22 other 3 bedroom house in Grantville have recently been sold.

Description:
VALUE FOR MONEY IN MOORINGS PLACE CORINELLA
Set in a fantastic area of Corinella - With approved sub-division already done for you, all on its own title and slab already to go sitting on approx 500m, in a much sought after location in Corinella. With foreshore at the end of the street, walking track, 24 hour boat ramp only minutes away. Not forgetting a short 90 minutes’ drive from Melbourne and bus services, with easy access to the general store. Buy this block and design your own home on existing slab or remove slab and start again to build your holiday home, perfect to build on if looking to downsize or build for a rental investment.
Agent available 7 days a week.
Insights: 9A MOORINGS PLACE, Corinella VIC 3984 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
OLD WORLD CHARM
Packed full of the cute factor, this home has loads of potential and is priced to sell. Only 15 minutes to Lang Lang, 30 minutes to Cranbourne make this an ideal location for an investment (currently tenanted until May 2017 for $200 per week) or renovate and enjoy. If you are starting out in the property market, it doesn't get much more affordable that this! The home is highset, filled in down stairs and two levels inside with two bedrooms, bathroom and kitchen on the first level and a good size living area leading to a deck to capture the bay breezes. Outside is established gardens, a garage and plenty of off street parking.

Description:
Titled Land Ready For Your Home
Terrific block of Land on Portview Avenue, Grantville is titled and ready to build your home on. With 576 m2, the site will cater for most house designs. The Eastern Shores Estate is literally a minute's walk to the heart of Grantville where you have a Post Office, Chemist, Medical Clinic and Ambulance station plus several Cafes to choose from. Bus transport passes the shops and the road links to Gippsland, Philip Island and Melbourne are excellent. Grantville satisfies buyer demand for affordable land and housing yet is commutable to Dandenong and Pakenham, Cranbourne areas and is serviced by excellent schools. One of only a few blocks with titles ready to build on, this one could be ;yours.

Description:
Lot 7, (No 13)Terrific Block in Grantville Rise Estate
This 544 m2 block is titled and ready to build your choice of home design on. With a 16 metre frontage and a depth of 34 metres, the land offers flexibility to build just about any house design. Grantville is rapidly becoming popular to build at as the prices are reasonable and the commute to the outer suburbs is achievable. Great for couples, families or retirees and investors, it's difficult to source land so cheap.
A quick walk through the estate brings you to the centre of Grantville and to the Pier where you can fish or take a stroll.

Description:
EXTENDED AND RENOVATED ON 1/3 ACRE
This home has had an extensive renovation and now has 4 big bedrooms plus a study area, the master is massive with a full ensuite and doors leading to the fernery. The main living area is open plan with new floors going in. The home is set back on the block and there is a double garage plus other shedding and plenty of space to park extra cars, boats, caravans or trucks. Backing onto farmland, this property has a lovely rural feel, yet only 5 minutes to Grantville, 15 min to San Remo and public transport close by. A perfect permanent home.

Description:
Dream Block
This titled block is ready to build on and faces Westernport with potential bay views from an elevated home or double storey. Spanning a spacious 503 m2 (approx.)the neighbouring modern homes present very well and the estate is very handy to all amenities and the Pier. This level block is an easy stroll to all the amenities Grantville Village shops have to offer. 20 mins by road to Phillip Island or a short 40 min commute to Cranbourne.
All you need to do is appoint a builder and get things underway!

Description:
New Estate with Westernport Views
This vacant block of land in the Grantville Rise Estate enjoys Westernport Bay views from the back of the property. The property is elevated from the road and is surrounded by a growing number of new homes constructed in this growing suburb. Grantville has medical facilities, Post Office, Chemist and cafes to meet the growing number of people moving to the area. The block will suit most styles of homes as it is a regular shape. Fenced on one side, this could be the perfect block you have been seeking to build your home.

Description:
FLAT TITLED BLOCK - EASTERN SHORES, GRANTVILLE 16.64 m x 35.76 m
This block in 'Eastern Shores' estate in central Grantville offers ability to build immediately as titles are issued. One boundary fence is erected and there are quality homes already built and others coming soon adjacent to this land. The central position allows you to ditch the car and take a short walk to the Post Office, Newsagent, Bakery and just a stroll away from the beach, Medical Clinic and Council offices. Grantville is growing in popularity and is surrounded by regional townships of Koo Wee Rup and Lang Lang within 20 mins drive, Cranbourne and Pakenham, Wonthaggi, San Remo and Cowes all around 30 - 40 mins away. Melbourne CBD is approx. 1.5 hours drive and there is an excellent V Line Bus Service running regularly. The land measures 16.64 m x 35.76 m, it's affordable and relatively flat so ideal to build on without significant site costs.

Description:
4 Bedroom Family Home - Under Construction Now!
Ideally located in "The Grantville Rise Estate" - surrounded by all new homes, walking tracks, minutes walk to the foreshore & enjoy the great coffee & service that Grantville shops have to offer, as well as having easy access to public V-line transport. Close to all the boat ramps to enjoy the day out fishing on Western Port Bay! Under construction now, this house & land package includes Dishwasher, electric stainless steel hot cooking appliances hotplates & underbench oven, aluminium windows, holland blinds, flyscreens, TV antenna, full ensuite, Brivas split system airconditioning, tiles to the wet areas, quality carpets, grass turf to front yard, topsoil and seed to rear yard. Garage has a remote panel lift door. Fold down clothes line. This home is a turn key package, just move in enjoy & relax with the family! Approximately 1 hour 25 min to Melbourne and 20 mins to Phillip Island, Grantville Rise will be an easy escape from the city, and offers direct access via the Bass Hwy. For further details about this home and land package please click "email agent" link above.

Description:
RENOVATED HOME OPPOSITE FORESHORE
This charming spacious home has been tastefully renovated yet still retains it's coastal cottage charm. Set across from the foreshore where you can enjoy sunset strolls and walks on the beach. The home has been rewired and replumbed and has floating floors to the large living area with wood and electric heating and doors leading to the two spacious front decks where you can entertain a crowd or simply enjoy the serenity. The kitchen has been has been update and has a gas stove and large fridge space. There are three bedrooms with built in robes and ceiling fans and two bathrooms. Outside is established gardens, shed and storage areas and a summer house to relax and take in the views. A delightful home for holidays, investment or simply live in and enjoy. Agent available 7 days a week.

Description:
Amazing presentation
This well presented and very attractive home would suit all types of buyers.
Situated on a 505 M2 block on a quiet back street, not far from the water with a big backyard.
- 3 Bedrooms, Master has Ensuite.
- Lounge with Wood Heater.
- New Kitchen and Dining area with a big Family room.
- Very well set out backyard for Entertaining.
This home has been extensively renovated and is presented in excellent condition for the area.
Not far from Township of Grantville and Boat Ramp with plenty of parking for Boat, Caravan, Etc.
To arrange an immediate inspection call Colin Butler.

Description:
10 ACRES EXCEPTIONAL OPPORTUNITY CORINELLA
Perfectly positioned to enjoy the stunning natural beauty for which the Bass Coast is renowned, this prime allotment of 10 acres offers magnificent wineries and the rugged Bass Strait coastline that distinguishes this idyllic part of the world, the potential is abundantly clear.
The land is perfect for small numbers of livestock, horses or even to create your own self sufficient lifestyle.
The home features cathedral ceilings, polished timber floors and an enclosed wood heater & ceiling fans to ensure your year round comfort. 3 good sized bedrooms, with built in robes. Open plan living and dining. Kitchen, bathroom and separate toilet.
The home has a bullnose veranda giving it that country cottage feel. Single carport, stables x 2 and 2 large tanks and town water on property, along with 3 bay shed.
This property is a must see if you are looking for that perfect rural coastal life style.
If you are unable to attend a scheduled Open House, please phone for a private viewing.

Description:
Blue Chip Block Ready to Build On
A great block of 544 m2 or 16 m x 34 m is available at Lot 8, No. 15 Brazier Street in Grantville Rise Estate in Grantville. Slightly elevated from the road yet reasonably flat, this is one of a handful of blocks left on this reasonably priced estate. Enjoying a northerly aspect, this block offers flexibility to build a large range of house designs. Ideally located just a few minutes walk into the centre of Grantville along the estate pathway where you can have a coffee at a number of cafes, stroll along the foreshore and Pier or catch a bus along Bass Hwy. Easy transport links into Melbourne, Gippsland and Philip Island, Grantville is enjoying a lot of buyer interest due to it's easy commute, location to safe swimming beach at Coronet Bay and the famous surfing spots at Philip Island and Inverloch and beyond.

Description:
EASTERN SHORES ESTATE 596m2
Eastern Shores newest land release Stage 3.
Located at the gateway to the beautiful Bass Coast Eastern Shores is a comfortable 80 minute drive from Melbourne metropolitan and only 40 minutes commute to Pakenham and a short 15 min drive to Phillip Island and all that it has to offer.
With a variety of block sizes available to suit a wide range of needs come design and build your stunning dream home on one of these affordable coastal blocks where life and style come together.
